body:
Trying to build gcc@6.2.0 on Centos 7.2 x64 and get

```
configure: error: cannot compute sizeof (long long)
```

This error resulted from doing the following:

```
$ yum install gcc gcc-g++ autoconf autotools libtool bzip2 xz
...
$ spack compiler add
==> Added 1 new compiler to /home/will/.spack/compilers.yaml
    gcc@4.8.5
$ spack install gcc@6.2.0
```
title: Installing gcc@6.2: `configure: error: cannot compute sizeof (long long)`
